scripts.ci.base.setup: npm i && npm i -g typescript && tsc && echo no | npm i -g nativescript && tns usage-reporting disable && tns error-reporting disable && cd src && npm i && tsc
scripts.ci.pip.install: sudo pip install --upgrade pip && sudo pip install six
scripts.ci.tslint: cd src && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && npm run ci.tslint
scripts.ci.ng.android.build: cd src && npm pack && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove @nstudio/nativescript-camera-plus && tns plugin add ../src/nstudio-nativescript-camera-plus-3.0.5.tgz && tns build android --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.ci.ng.ios.build: cd src && npm pack && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove @nstudio/nativescript-camera-plus && tns plugin add ../src/nstudio-nativescript-camera-plus-3.0.5.tgz && tns build ios --env.aot --env.uglify
